channel.title: Creating Websites on Harish Guda
channel.description: Recent content in Creating Websites on Harish Guda

item.title: Some Information on Creating Websites with R
item.description: Update: Much of this information is available in detail at multiple places, including: The Little Dataset, Official Blogdown E-Book, Alison Hill (who is a co-author on the textbook), among others. I had previously owned a Google Site, which I never liked. I am quite comfortable with R, and when Yihui Xie and co-authors came out with the book on blogdown, I decided to try it. However, it can be still quite difficult with no experience to HTML, or prior exposure to CSS.
